scripts.watch:css: npm run mk-css && stylus -u autoprefixer-stylus -w -c src/stylus/main.styl -o dist/assets/css/main.css
scripts.watch:js: npm run mk-js && browserify src/js/main.js -o -t babelify && npm run js-watch
scripts.js-watch: watchify src/js/main.js -t babelify -o dist/assets/js/main.js | uglifyjs dist/assets/js/main.js -c -m -o dist/assets/js/main.js
scripts.watch:images: npm run mk-img && imagemin src/img/**/* -o dist/assets/img
scripts.watch:server: nodemon app & browser-sync start --proxy 'localhost:2122' --files 'dist/assets/css/*.css, dist/*.html, dist/assets/js/*.js' reload
